articles.title: Major Security Alert for Android Users - News18
articles.description:
CERT-In has warned millions of Android smartphone
users in India about a major security risk that puts Android
versions 10 to 13 in a vulnerable position.
articles.content: Producer:  Priyanka DasEditor: Sujata Singh

articles.author: Tom Misch
articles.title: Modder Releases Cool New DYOM Mission for Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas - Game Is Hard

articles.content: A modder known as ‘Berony’ has recently released an exciting new mod for Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas. This mod, called DYOM (Design Your Own Mission), allows players to design and share their own m… [+1395 chars]
